label: 被官人
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
説明文: It is well known that the bakufu imposed duties on the sake brewers and pawnbrokers (sakaya-dokurayaku 酒屋土倉役) of the capital regardless of whether they happened to be in the service (hikannin 被官人) of a member of the power elite. [SS]
